DOWNLOAD.SUCCESS: Playlist "{{ title }}" has been downloaded successfully

STREAMER.TITLE: Streamer mode
STREAMER.TIP: Writes information about the current track to files located in the specified folder for display via OBS and other applications for live broadcasts

FFMPEG.TITLE: Audio converting
FFMPEG.TIP: FFmpeg - it's free open-source tool to processing media files. Requires for combining streaming files into one
FFMPEG.LINUX: Install FFmpeg with following command and restart the application

ACRYLIC.TITLE: Enable Windows 11 Acrylic
ACRYLIC.TIP: You need to enable transparency effects in Windows settings

VOLUME_DIVIDER.TITLE: Volume divider
VOLUME_DIVIDER.TIP: If it seems to you that the volume of the tracks does not correspond to the specified percentage of the volume in the player, then change the volume divider

MINIMODE.TITLE: Mini mode for miniwindow
MINIMODE.TIP: Disables mini window controls and styles keeping only current track information

REWIND.TITLE: Rewind to the start
REWIND.TIP: By enabling this option, when you press the "previous track" button, the player will start playing the track again instead of playing the previous track if the listening progress has reached 10% or more

NORMALIZER.TITLE: Normalize audio volume
NORMALIZER.TIP: Averages the volume of the audio. Do not enable this option if you are listening to music at a medium or high volume level (from 20% and above)

MAX.TITLE: Maximum volume increase (dB)
MAX.TIP: The volume of music is a subjective concept. Choose for yourself the maximum percentage of music volume increase

LOADING_RESTRICTION.TITLE: Restriction on loading audios
LOADING_RESTRICTION.TIP: Here you can set the desired maximum number of tracks that will be loaded when playing playlists. By default, the number of downloaded tracks is 1000, the minimum is 100, the maximum is 10000. It is not recommended to set a value higher than 2000, this cause long downloads, freezes, crashes and high consumption of system resources with a large amount of audio

TEMPLATE.TITLE: File name template
TEMPLATE.TIP: Set a template for the file name when downloading using headers

CONFIRMATION.DELETE_PLAYLIST: Do you want to delete playlist "{{ title }}"?

PC.CHOOSE: Click to select files to upload

YOUTUBE.NOFFMPEG: You need to have FFmpeg installed to use this feature

LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: Listen to music in VK absolutely for free and without restrictions.

ERRORS.CYRILLIC: Cyrillic is not allowed in the password
ERRORS.EMPTY_FIELD: You must enter your username and password
ERRORS.TFA_REQUIRED: You must to enter two-factor authentication code. If you don't receive code from VK administration, then use Code Generator (E.g. Google Authenticator)
ERRORS.TFA_HTTP_REQUIRED: Now you must to enter two-factor code for HTTP Client
ERRORS.CAPTCHA_REQUIRED: You must to solve the captcha

EULA.TITLE: the user agreement
EULA.TEXT:
Before using Meridius, read the user agreement.

Meridius is proprietary software that does not pursue commercial purposes and is distributed free of charge. Meridius is an unofficial desktop music player for the VKontakte website, the application and its developer have nothing to do with the administration and other employees of VK.

Sending and storage data
Meridius collects statistics only on the number of users. Your credentials are not sent anywhere, only stored on your device in encrypted form.

Disclaimer
Developer are not responsible for the loss of your personal data in case of leaks or hacking.

SHARE_PLAYLIST.WALL: Playlist "{{ title }}" was successfully published on the wall

ERROR.APOLOGIZE: We're a deeply sorry. We sorry.
ERROR.CONTACT: An error occurred. You can also contact the developer to report it!

SUCCESS.SONG_ADDED: Track "{{ performer }} - {{ title }}" has been successfully added to the playlist "{{ playlist }}"
SUCCESS.SONG_SHARED: Track "{{ performer }} - {{ title }}" has been sent successfully

ERRORS.NO_FFMPEG: You must to install FFmpeg in settings before audio downloading
ERRORS.DOWNLOAD_NOT_SPECIFIED: Set the path to save audio in settings
ERRORS.NO_CONNECTION: No connection to VK. Attempting to reconnect...
ERRORS.NO_UNIQUE_HEADERS: No unique headers found, template not saved
ERRORS.STREAMER: Streamer mode: failed to save files. Reason:
ERRORS.OFTEN_EDIT: You're trying to edit a songs too often, try again later

HELP.TITLE: Help
HELP.LABEL: Let's see the answer for you're questions.

FAQ.question: Why?
FAQ.answer: The first reason - consuming of PC resources. Meridius consumes PC resources less than any desktop browser

FAQ.question: Why VK if Spotify / Apple Music more easy and has more music?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it has, many other services has more information about songs, artists and playlists, but from personal experience I could say that this services has no so much music cause VK users can upload any music in any time.

FAQ.question: I found a bug / I have an offer to improve Meridius
How to add song to playlist?
Can you upload source code?
FAQ.answer: I promise that source code will be upload if I tired of developing. In the meantime, I have the right not to do it.

FAQ.question: Very low FPS
FAQ.answer: This problem occurs on monitors with G-Sync support. Disable hardware acceleration in the settings and restart the app.

FAQ.question: Stucks on the logo. Can't load!
FAQ.answer: This happens if the signal does not reach VK. In this case, check which country you live in, and make sure that you have a VPN enabled in the system (that is, not an extension in the browser). Next, if you do not have VK blocked in your country, make sure that you have the original Windows installed, and not the Windows build, where everything unnecessary is supposedly disabled.

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Meridius is an absolutely free program for listening to music on the VK social network. Meridius offers a wide range of functionality, similar to the functionality of the social network itself. No dirty tricks - the program is absolutely free and without ads or any commercial purpose! The program was made by a music lover like you.

TIPS: Tip: Right-click on the playlist in the drop-down menu for quick playback
Tip: Right-click on "Music" or on your avatar to quickly play your music
Tip: Before asking for a feature from a developer, be ready to cooperate and help
Tip: Join our VK group to keep up to date with news about player development and updates
Tip: Before asking a question, read the FAQ
You can support the development of the project. The link is in the help window
NO_LISTENING_FRIENDS: None of your friends are listening to music right now
